Naresh, Nagineedu, Adityamenon Dialogues: Parashuram Lyrics: Bhaskar Bhatla Editor: Prawin Pudi Choreographer: Ganesh Swamy Executive Producer: Chinna D.O.P: C Ram Prasad Music: Radhan Co-Producer: C V Rao Producer: C Kalyan

movieInfo:
Directed by: Rajeswaran
Starring by: Mohan Raj, Varsha, Raja, Rithu Rai
Genres: Romantic, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Second Key is telugu romantic- thriller film released 2017. Rajeswaran directed the movie and Mohan Raj, Varsha, Raja, Rithu Rai play as lead role in film.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Vivek Athreya
Starring by: Sree Vishnu, Nivetha Pethuraj, Amrutha
Genres: Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Aravind succeeds in all facets of life, except for when he has to take a decision or talk to girls. Shy, awkward and insecure around girls, he gets by in life with the help of supportive friends and family. His parents want nothing but to see him ‘settle down’ and after facing 12 rejections, they set up his pelli choopulu with Swetcha (Nivetha Perthuraj).

movieInfo:
Directed by Rockesh Reddy
Starring by: Preetham Reddy, Rekha Boj, TNR, Badamgeer Sai
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Rangeela is a Telugu movie starring Preetham Reddy and Rekha Boj in prominent roles. It is a drama written and directed by Rockesh Reddy, with Pratap Reddy as the producer, forming part of the crew.

movieInfo:
Dr. Chakravarthy Movie Info:
Directed by: Shekhar Suri
Starring by: Richard, Sonia Mann, Lena Abhilash Kumar
Genres: Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Dr. Chakravarthy is an Telugu movie starring Sonia Mann and Richard Rishi in prominent roles. The movie also star Lena Abhilash Kumar. It is a thriller drama directed by Sekhar Suri with Vijay Kurakula as musician, forming part of the crew.

movieInfo:
Premika Movie Info:
Directed by: Mahindra
Starring by: Tanish, Shruti Yugal, Getup Srinu
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Two youngsters, Krishna and Shruthi are in love with each other and live a happy life. The only problem, however, is that the village sarpanch believes that his brother is killed by Krishna. What happens next, forms the crux.

movieInfo:
Marana Sasanam Movie Info:
Directed and written by: Johny Antony
Starring by: Prithviraj Sukumaran, M. Sasikumar, Mukesh
Genres: Action, Mystery, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Milan Paul and Sriramakrishnan are best friends who have been together since college. The intensity of their friendship has not faded though the carefree days of college have long past gone. Now Sree is an ASP (Assistant Superintendent of Police) of Kottayam and Milan is a renowned reporter in the same city. Though in different fields both are in highly responsible jobs. In effect, both of them use their friendship to fulfill their respective social responsibilities. Hot-tempered and impulsive Sree usually ends up in some sort of trouble and is always saved by Milan in the nick of the time. Consequently, Milan has to deal with physical and mental torture from Sree’s enemies but Sree reciprocates by saving Milan…

movieInfo:
Directed by: Gautham Menon
Written by: Gautham Menon, Kona Venkat
Starring by: Nani, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Krishnudu
Genres: Drama, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Yeto Vellipoyindhi Manasu begins with Varun (Nani) gaining admission into an engineering college. He and his friends one day participate in a cultural programme, where Varun finds his childhood sweetheart Nithya (Samantha) participating in a dance show. He begins wooing her by singing on stage and later meeting her. As they meet, the film rewinds to their early days when both were in third standard. They become good friends after a small incident and their friendship blossoms. But due to a misunderstanding, Nithya decides not to meet Varun and to never talk with him. However, as destiny would have it, they meet again in their tenth standard.

movieInfo:
Directed by: David Twohy
Written by: David Twohy, Jim Wheat
Starring by: Vin Diesel, Karl Urban, Katee Sackhoff
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The infamous Riddick has been left for dead on a sun-scorched planet that appears to be lifeless. Soon, however, he finds himself fighting for survival against alien predators more lethal than any human he’s encountered. The only way off is for Riddick to activate an emergency beacon and alert mercenaries who rapidly descend to the planet in search of their bounty. The first ship to arrive carries a new breed of merc, more lethal and violent, while the second is captained by a man whose pursuit of Riddick is more personal. With time running out and a storm on the horizon that no one could survive, his hunters won’t leave the planet without Riddick’s head as their trophy.

movieInfo:
Directed by: David Twohy
Written by: Jim Wheat, Ken Wheat
Starring by: Vin Diesel, Judi Dench, Colm Feore
Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Five years ago… Escaped convict Richard B. Riddick escaped from a desert planet with his two companions, religious man Imam and runaway teenage girl Jack. After five years wandering across the outskirts of the galaxy and being hunted by bounty hunters calming the bounty on his head, Riddick arrives on the colonized planet New Mecca, he learns Imam placed the bounty on his head and Jack has been imprisoned on the prison planet “Crematoria” for murder. Riddick learns from Aereon, ambassador of the Elemental race is seeking out Furians, a race of warriors in a bid to balance the universe, as a warrior army known as The Necromongers led by the evil undead Lord Marshal are invading every planet in the galaxy and cleansing all of humanity in their goal for universal conquest.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Alex Winter
Written by: James Krieg, Man of Action
Starring by: Ryan Kelley, Alyssa Diaz, Nathan Keyes
Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi
Country: USA
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Against his grandfather’s orders, Ben Tennyson teams up with the daughter of an old enemy in order to prevent an alien infestation of earth.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Sreenu Immandi
Starring by: Ashwini, Nandu, Sreemukhi, Miss Roshini
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: The movie revolves around four engineering students, who meet in college and become friends. It also depicts the ups and downs of their life as they share everything with each other.

movieInfo:
Director: Sreekarababu
Stars: Bindu Barbie, Krishna Bhagavan, Brahmanandam
Genres: Comedy
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Nenu Kidnap Ayyanu based on the story of a group of friends who decide to start up a software company. They take their project and meet a top-notch IT person called Dubey(Posani). Impressed by their work, Dubey appoints them as his teammates and promises them to take their project to an even higher level. The twist in the tale arises when Dubey sells off the project to another company and makes a lot of money. Rest of the story is as to how the friends teach Dubey a lesson and get their project back.

movieInfo:
Directed by: V.S. Vasu
Starring by: Nandu,Sreemukhi, Kamal Kamaraju
Genres: Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Chandu and Pallavi are married to each other but since they both are software engineers, they barely have any time to spend on their family. While this is going on, a security guard likes Pallavi. Things take a turn when a murder takes place and disturbs all of them.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Srinivasaraj
Starring by: Upendra, Saloni Aswani, Ragini Dwivedi
Genres: Action, Romance
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Basavanna(Upendra) is a Brahmin boy who does not believe in the basic formalities of daily life. He hails from a family of priests who are the ancestral care takers of a prestigious temple. What ever important task the temple has to undergo, some one from Basavanna’s family fulfils it. Twist in the tale arises when Basavanna’s dad dies and he is forced to take the duty of the priest in the temple. Right when Bavsanna takes things in his hand, a meticulous murder attack is planned on him which he survives cleverly.

movieInfo:
Directed and written by: Karthik Medikonda
Starring by: Kiran, Harshada Kulkarni, Gayatri Gupta
Genres: Crime, Romance, Thriller
Country: India
Language: Telugu
movieDescription: Aryan, a journalist working with a lifestyle magazine, hates his boss and also is tired of supporting his girlfriend’s partying lifestyle. Things get worse for him when he loses his wallet at a bar and in a twist of fate, he finds himself being threatened by junkies.

movieInfo:
Directed by: Martin Campbell
Written by: David Marconi, Stephen Leather
Starring by: Katie Leung, Jackie Chan, Rufus Jones
Genres: Action, Thriller
Country: USA
Language: Telugu (India)
movieDescription: A humble businessman with a buried past seeks justice when his daughter is killed in an act of terrorism. A cat-and-mouse conflict ensues with a government official, whose past may hold clues to the killers’ identities.
